abstract: Atlanta is favored over Carolina, no surprise given their seasons last year, but statistically they're nearly identical teams, with one critical difference.
snippet: Atlanta is favored over Carolina, no surprise given their seasons last year, but statistically they're nearly identical teams, with one critical difference.
lead_paragraph: My statistics disagree with the consensus favorites in only one matchup this weekend: Panthers versus  Falcons at Atlanta. It's not surprising most people favor the home-team Falcons. Carolina is 1-4, coming off a 2-14 season, while Atlanta is 2-3, coming off a 13-3 season. But statistically they're nearly identical teams, with one critical difference.
